item.title: Building Volumes
item.description: BuildingVolumes is a global initiative by creatives, software engineers, teachers, and artists with the aim to create a free and open-source volumetric capture and playback pipeline. The initative is led by Ciny Poremba and Andrew Hogue. We want to create free and sustainable tools for small artists, creatives, filmographers, game artists and everyone interested in the creation of Volumetric Video. If you want to join us, or get in touch, please head over to our community discord üôÇ
